message: I'm feeling generous, but I think we can both agree that 90/10 is a fair split. What do you think?
I'll give you a smaller share this time, but I think 80/20 is a fair split, considering the initial offer was too generous.
Okay, I see your point about fairness. I'm willing to compromise, but 70/30 feels more balanced.  Let's end this already!
I'm not getting any younger, but I'm not giving up yet. 60/40 is a more realistic split, considering the money's value is dropping.
